name: Mushroom Boy Gets Stuck in a Playplace
name_original: Mushroom Boy Gets Stuck in a Playplace
description:
Mushroom Boy Gets Stuck in a Playplace is a puzzle game developed by ThatLeftHandMan. It came out on 26-03-2023.
You can play Mushroom Boy Gets Stuck in a Playplace on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
